original_text: But what I tell you is this: A man must not send his wife away except for one reason. He may only send her away if she has had sex with another man. If he sends her away for any other reason, he has done a wrong thing. It is like he has caused her to have sex with another man. Also, if a woman has left her husband, another man must not marry her. That is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife.’
korean_text: 나는 너희에게 이르노니 누구든지 음행한 이유 없이 아내를 버리면 이는 그로 간음하게 함이요 또 누구든지 버림받은 여자에게 장가드는 자도 간음함이니라

sentences.original_text: But what I tell you is this:
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 너희에게 말하는 것은 이것이다:

sentences.original_text: A man must not send his wife away
He may only send her away
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀를 내보낼 수 있는 유일한 경우는

sentences.original_text: if she has had sex with another man.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 다른 남자와 성관계를 했을 때뿐이다

sentences.original_text: If he sends her away for any other reason,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 다른 이유로 그녀를 내보낸다면

sentences.original_text: he has done a wrong thing.
It is like he has caused her to have sex with another man.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 마치 그가 그녀가 다른 남자와 성관계를 하도록 만든 것과 같다

sentences.original_text: Also, if a woman has left her husband,
another man must not marry her.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 남자는 그녀와 결혼해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: That is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 마치 그가 다른 남자의 아내와 성관계를 한 것과 같다
